gate_results.detail: JSON parse and required schema contract fields are complete.
All strategic claims map to ClaimContract and valid MetricContract refs.
All phase transitions map to GateContract and EvidenceContract inputs.
No wall-clock authority in normative timing logic; timing fields use HTF boundary IDs.
Referential integrity passed: no dangling *_ref IDs.
Every strategic claim has a falsification path in physics_feasibility_model or scenario_matrix.
Every adjacent roadmap milestone pair maps to a RoadmapBridgeContract.
Bridge chains have ordered IntermediateStepContract records with complete predicates, owners, HTF boundaries, and evidence refs.
Dependency refs resolve and dependency graphs are acyclic.
Exactly one active PrincipalContract mapped to Shovon Hasan (@anveio) as sole proprietor.
All AgentIdentityContract records bind to the active principal and a valid DelegationContract.
All financial action classes map to FinancialActionContract, SpendPolicyContract, and fail-closed GateContract predicates.
Finance autonomy targets are quantified and evidence-bound.
Revocation correctness controls are present with zero unresolved high-risk miss target.
